title: Coding
description: Develop the required code or scripts.
Ensure code follows project standards and guidelines.

title: Testing
description: Write and execute unit and integration tests.
Perform manual or automated testing as needed.

title: Documentation
description: Document the feature, module, or task in markdown or text files.
Update SOPs and changelogs if applicable.

title: Code Review
description: Submit code for peer review via GitHub Pull Requests.
Address review comments and make necessary changes.

title: Merge and Deployment
description: Merge approved code into the main branch.
Deploy or integrate the feature as required.

title: Verification
description: Verify the feature works as intended in the target environment.
Confirm no regressions or issues remain.
